summary: MMP contains 79 new moons to download, sorted into the following categories Earth, Frost, Mineral, Gas, Misc, Rocky, Suns, Water. Also includes 3 Bonus galaxy replacers. Includes pictures of each individual moon.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29304-1-1357865569.png[/img]
[color=silver]MMP contains 79 new moons to download, sorted into the following categories Earth, Frost, Mineral, Gas, Misc, Rocky, Suns, Water. Also includes 3 Bonus galaxy replacers. Includes pictures of each individual moon.

INSTALLATION:

1. Select a planet & open the folder
2. Drag the \'Data\' folder into your Skyrim directory, merge & overwrite any files.
3. Enjoy!
4. If you want any to be the secunda moon, just rename to files to secunda_full, secunda_half_wan etc... 

Credits:

-Paint.net + Various Plug-Ins, I.e Shape 3d.
-Various texture libraries (licence free.)
-Various DeviantART Planet resource textures.
-Adobe Photoshop CS6.[/color]


[color=red]Recommended Mod[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1037]26 Moon Size Tweeks by akindain[/url]
author: Twisted Method
